name: Indexical
headline: AI-powered data extraction engine
tags: industry:developer-tools; industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:enterprise; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Shanelle Roman, Founder
founders.description: Shanelle is the cofounder and CEO of Nebula. Shanelle was previously a PM at Google, working on the buying experience for a new $XB line of Google ads. Originally from Minnesota, she graduated from Yale with a degree in Computer Science.

founders.name: Vishnu Menon, Founder
founders.description: Vishnu Menon is the Co-founder & CTO of Nebula, where he builds tools that help engineers be productive in microservice architectures. Previously, he was co-founder at an ML startup (Toucan AI) and lead data & platform projects at a MarTech software provider (AddShoppers). He earned a degree in Computer Science from Duke University.

raw_markdown='[#Indexical](https://indexical.dev/</>)[Playground](https://indexical.dev/<https:/playground.indexical.dev/>)[Blog](https://indexical.dev/<https:/blog.indexical.dev/>)[Docs](https://indexical.dev/<https:/docs.indexical.dev>)[Console](https://indexical.dev/<https:/console.indexical.dev>)[Sign Up](https://indexical.dev/<https:/auth.indexical.dev/en/signup>)
Get The DataYou Need 
Write & run zero-maintenance web scraping pipelines with natural language steps
[Get Started →](https://indexical.dev/<https:/auth.indexical.dev/en/signup>)
Backed byCombinator
```
  {
"action": "navigate",
"goal": "Find a link to the product specifications"  },
  {
"action": "extract",
"goal": "Extract the product details",
"schema": {
"product_number": {
"type": "string",
"description": "This device's Product Number"     },
"price": {
"type": "string",
"description": "The device's price"     },
"description": "$mainContent"   }
  }
      
```

Powered by LLMsIndexical uses LLMs to intelligently navigate the web and extract data, so you don't have to worry about brittle selectors and complicated interaction scripts.
Built for DevsIndexical scraping & crawling jobs are defined with well-documented, version-controllable JSON pipelines that give you fine-grain control without any boilerplate.
Fault-tolerant & RobustIndexical's scrapers automatically handle proxying, retries, rate-limiting, and other best-practices to ensure you get the data you're looking for
Fully ManagedIndexical provides an easy-to-use API, a CLI, and a web UI to make creating, running, and monitoring your scraping jobs as smooth as possible
# Pricing for Every Need
Choose the plan that fits your business best.
### Free
$0/month
No credit card required
1000 credits per month
API and dashboard access

## Understanding Credit Usage
Scraping & crawling jobs in Indexical can use different amounts of credits depending on their complexity and resource-usage. See the table below to estimate which plan is appropriate for your intended usecase.
Action| Cost  
---|---  
Non-proxy page load| 1 credit  
Proxy page load| 5 credits  
LLM extraction| 5 credits  
Visual extraction| 5 credits  
Search API query| 5 credits

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Indexical**

Founded in 2022 and based in San Francisco, Indexical is a nimble player in the world of data extraction. As part of Y Combinator’s Winter 2023 batch, they're building an AI-powered data extraction engine tailored for developers. With a team of just two, Indexical aims to serve a broad spectrum of businesses through intelligent, efficient web scraping.

**Mission and Product:**
The primary mission of Indexical is to simplify data extraction with an AI-driven approach. They offer a platform that allows users to write and run web scraping pipelines using natural language, eliminating the need for complex coding and maintenance. It's backed by advanced LLMs (Large Language Models) that navigate the web and extract data smartly, so users don’t have to deal with fragile selectors and the headaches of scripting browser interactions.

**Key Features:**
- **Zero-Maintenance Pipelines:** Users can craft scraping jobs with well-documented, version-controllable JSON pipelines.
- **Fault-tolerant Scrapers:** Automatic handling of proxying, retries, and rate limits to ensure successful data extraction.
- **Fully Managed Services:** An accessible API, CLI, and web UI make it easy to create, run, and monitor scraping tasks.

**Pricing Plans:**
Indexical offers competitive pricing with plans tailored to various needs:
- **Free:** $0/month, featuring 1,000 monthly credits.
- **Hobby:** $30/month for 3,000 credits.
- **Startup:** $100/month grants 20,000 credits and priority support.
- **Growth:** At $500/month, this plan includes 150,000 credits and exclusive support options.

**Contact and Resources:**
To explore their offerings or sign up, you can visit [Indexical's website](https://indexical.dev/). They also provide support through a chat function for those who require additional help or credits.

**Conclusion:**
With its innovative approach to data extraction and a focus on developer-friendly solutions, Indexical stands out as a promising startup in the generative AI and SaaS landscape. It’s an exciting venture that aligns well with the growing need for smarter data handling within businesses.
